name: An UNAUTHORIZED Life in West America

metadata.name: Megapixel'd Desperado
metadata.description:
"Life in West America" by Roope Rainisto is an epic series on so many levels. However, I noticed that I get lost in the stunning richness and beauty of the whole image, which causes me to miss some of the most interesting generative elements.

With this series, I use the Megapixel process to soften the focus on much of the image, so that the coolest parts are highlighted.

I've also found that this combined approach brings a new and different type of beauty to the overall image.

As with all Megapixel artworks, no Bushi was repeated in its creation.
